short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays your ((Precious jewel))s in farmrpg. Works with some parts so far.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays Aquamarine as a Precious Jewel instead. 
Current Replacements:
- Chat(replaces ((precious jewel)) with item image)
- Aquamarine Item Page is now Precious Jewel
- Now you can chat about your precious jewels all day.
